activities: Development of an integrated system that incorporates Time Keeping & Resource Loading Information, Contact Information, Project Cost Accounting for corporations that operate in these regions (Germany, Italy, Poland, & Sweden).  We do not anticipate collecting, processing or hosting any Personal Information but may be exposed to it as the Personal Information resides in the databases that we are integrating.

recoursemech: For disputes involving personal information received by reVision from the EEA, reVision has agreed to cooperate with the data protection authorities in the EEA and to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European data protection authorities
